## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_RATE" property

Emitted when the rate per second at which particles are emitted is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_RATE]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        rate: number;
    };
```
